attributes.action: make the article by George Macdonald Fraser ( DAILY MAIL 5th January 2008 ) compulsory reading in all schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Political Correctness,is there no end?
Its alright for everyone , except the indiginous population.
A free country, freedom of speach, dont make me laugh!,if we keep going as we are doing it wont be long before we reach the bottom of the pit, or have I got that wrong, maybe we reach the dizzy heights of a third world country.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
